block.p: SPECIAL TODAY The Millennium Envisioning the future of politics, people, cities and machines -- even the front page of The Times -- and reflecting on the past. SECTION E

Dow 3 Million, or Bust? The stock market: where it's been, and might be going. PAGE C1
Correction, 102 Years Later The issue number on this page was wrong until yesterday. So was an article in 1995 about No. 50,000. The Times regrets its math. PAGE A22
Elliot Richardson Dies The official who would not fire a Watergate prosecutor for President Richard M. Nixon was 79. PAGE B7
